DOC.brief_summary: To examine safety efficacy Z-338 ( YM443 ) long-term administration patient functional dyspepsia , also examine pattern long-term administration .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term , Open-label , Uncontrolled Trial YM443 ( Z-338 ) Patients With Functional Dyspepsia
